metaTitle: CA LOS OLIVOS Los Alcazares | Villa from €689,900
metaDescription: Discover CA LOS OLIVOS in Los Alcazares, Murcia. Modern 3-bed villas from €689,900 by ASARON STUDIO. Ready October 2025. Invest in Costa Blanca's rising market.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to CA LOS OLIVOS, an exceptional new development by the renowned ASARON STUDIO in the heart of Valle del Sol, Los Alcazares. This carefully curated collection of modern 3-bedroom villas represents the pinnacle of contemporary Mediterranean living, combining architectural excellence with strategic location advantage. Each property features 130m² of thoughtfully designed living space set on 354m² private plots, creating the perfect balance between comfort and outdoor enjoyment. With prices starting from just €689,900 and completion scheduled for October 1st, 2025, CA LOS OLIVOS offers discerning buyers a unique opportunity to invest in one of Costa Blanca's most dynamic markets. ASARON STUDIO's commitment to quality construction and attention to detail ensures these homes will appreciate significantly in value while providing an ideal lifestyle for families, couples, and investors seeking proximity to beaches, golf courses, and a thriving international community.

locationSection.intro: Valle del Sol in Los Alcazares represents one of Murcia's most sought-after residential destinations, where authentic Spanish charm meets modern European lifestyle. This established area has become a magnet for international buyers and expat communities, thanks to its perfect balance of tranquility and convenience. The region offers a well-developed infrastructure with excellent healthcare facilities, international education options, and cosmopolitan amenities within easy reach. Los Alcazares benefits from its strategic position on the Costa Blanca, providing residents with immediate access to pristine Mediterranean beaches while maintaining proximity to vibrant urban centers. The local community actively welcomes international residents, with English widely spoken throughout shops, restaurants, and services. This welcoming environment, combined with the area's reputation for safety, stability, and consistent property appreciation, makes Valle del Sol an ideal choice for those seeking a quality lifestyle investment.
highlights: Beach: 20 minutes to multiple Blue Flag beaches
Golf: Several championship courses within 15-25 minutes
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics available
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets on doorstep
International Schools: British curriculum and international options nearby

propertyFeatures.intro: CA LOS OLIVOS represents ASARON STUDIO's commitment to delivering homes that exceed expectations in both design and construction quality. Each villa is built to exacting Spanish building standards with premium materials and finishes throughout. The properties feature open-plan living spaces flooded with natural light, modern kitchens equipped with quality appliances, and spa-like bathrooms with contemporary fixtures. Climate control systems, secure entry features, and dedicated storage ensure these homes deliver comfort and convenience. The generous 354m² plots allow for private gardens and outdoor entertaining spaces, while optional community amenities enhance the lifestyle offering. Construction incorporates thermal break double glazing, quality ceramic flooring, and professional installations throughout.
features: Swimming pool (communal or private check availability)
Fully fitted kitchen with quality appliances

content.investmentSection: The Los Alcazares property market is experiencing robust growth, with year-on-year appreciation of 8%, significantly outperforming many Mediterranean coastal markets. CA LOS OLIVOS enters this market at an exceptional value point—approximately 40% below comparable properties in Spanish island markets—while offering identical quality and lifestyle benefits. At €2,200 per m², these villas represent outstanding value for investors seeking both capital appreciation and income generation. The rental market is particularly strong, with 7-night holiday rentals commanding €800 in the area, indicating excellent short-term rental potential for those seeking investment returns. The established international community and proven market fundamentals make Los Alcazares an increasingly attractive destination for both owner-occupiers and portfolio investors. Early adopters of CA LOS OLIVOS will benefit from first-mover advantage as the project delivers and establishes itself as a premium landmark development in the region.
whyBuySection: Strategic location in Valle del Sol with established infrastructure
Trusted developer: ASARON STUDIO with proven track record
Exceptional value: 40% less than Spanish island markets
Generous plots: 354m² private land per villa
Thriving international community with English widely spoken
Immediate access to multiple Blue Flag beaches (20 minutes)
Championship golf courses within 15-25 minutes drive
Rental income potential: €800 per week demonstrated demand

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in CA LOS OLIVOS?
faqs.answer: CA LOS OLIVOS villas start from €689,900 for 3-bedroom properties with 2 bathrooms, 130m² built area on 354m² plots. This represents exceptional value at €2,200 per m². Contact us for current availability and any special launch offers.

faqs.question: When will CA LOS OLIVOS be completed?
faqs.answer: Construction completion is scheduled for October 1st, 2025. ASARON STUDIO provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. We recommend contacting our sales team for detailed delivery schedules and payment plans tailored to your requirements.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of CA LOS OLIVOS?
faqs.answer: ASARON STUDIO is the developer behind CA LOS OLIVOS. They bring extensive experience building quality homes throughout Los Alcazares and surrounding regions, with a proven reputation for professional project management and customer satisfaction.

faqs.question: Is Los Alcazares a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Los Alcazares is an excellent property investment destination. The area features an established, welcoming international community where English is commonly spoken. Market data shows 8% year-on-year appreciation, excellent healthcare including a regional hospital within 30 minutes, and multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes. The combination of lifestyle amenities, investment fundamentals, and community infrastructure makes it ideal for buyers.

faqs.question: How far is CA LOS OLIVOS from the beach?
faqs.answer: CA LOS OLIVOS is situated approximately 20 minutes from multiple Blue Flag beaches. This proximity provides easy beach access for leisure and water activities while maintaining the peaceful, residential atmosphere of Valle del Sol. The location offers the ideal balance of seaside convenience and quiet living.

faqs.question: What amenities are near CA LOS OLIVOS?
faqs.answer: The immediate vicinity includes major supermarkets (Mercadona, Lidl, Consum), regional healthcare including a hospital within 30 minutes and private clinics, several championship golf courses within 15-25 minutes, international schools with British curriculum options, and a full range of restaurants and local services. English-speaking staff are readily available throughout the area.

faqs.question: Can I rent out my CA LOS OLIVOS villa?
faqs.answer: Yes, the rental market in Los Alcazares is strong, with 7-night holiday rentals commanding €800 in the area. Many owners successfully generate rental income through both short-term tourist rentals and longer-term leasing arrangements. We recommend discussing rental strategies and legal requirements with our sales team.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain, including EU and non-EU citizens. You do not require Spanish residency or a visa specifically to buy property. Many international investors own properties throughout Costa Blanca. We recommend consulting with a Spanish property lawyer to understand any tax implications specific to your circumstances.

content.conclusion: CA LOS OLIVOS represents a rare convergence of investment opportunity and lifestyle excellence. ASARON STUDIO has created a development that appeals equally to those seeking a Mediterranean home and savvy investors capitalizing on Los Alcazares' proven market strength. With completion just months away, early reservation ensures optimal plot selection and villa configuration. The combination of exceptional value, strategic location, quality construction, and proven market fundamentals positions CA LOS OLIVOS as a cornerstone development for Costa Blanca real estate. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday home, or investment property, CA LOS OLIVOS delivers on all fronts. Contact our sales team today via WhatsApp to arrange a private viewing, discuss payment options, or request detailed specifications. Don't miss this opportunity to invest in one of Spain's most dynamic coastal markets.
